responsibilities: Innovate in the entire end-to-end ML production pipeline, crafting creative approaches to datasets, model training, and on-device inference optimizations.
Collaborate closely with hardware, computer architecture, and software teams to drive data-driven decision-making and innovation.
Analyze and leverage large datasets, identifying and addressing data gaps, predicting potential future gaps, and designing robust data collection strategies.
Build, fine-tune, and optimize machine learning models, ensuring their performance is fine-tuned for on-device deployment.
Develop features and models enhancing machine learning systems, including scaling up model training, building data pipelines, and optimizing performance.
Review and implement cutting-edge machine learning algorithms.
Work closely with cross-functional partners across the stack, including Apps, Compilation, Hardware, etc.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities mention building, fine-tuning, and optimizing machine learning models, which aligns with the activity of fine-tuning and customizing language models. However, the responsibilities do not specifically mention language models or domain-specific tasks related to LLMs. The focus seems to be more on general machine learning models and on-device deployment rather than large language models.
